title: _GET_VEHICLE_COUNTERMEASURE_COUNT
content:
0xF846AA63DF56B804// GetVehicleCountermeasureCount
int _GET_VEHICLE_COUNTERMEASURE_COUNT(Vehicle aircraft);Parameters:aircraft: The vehicle to get the amount of countermeasures from.Returns: An int indicating the amount of countermeasures remaining on that plane.Similar to _GET_AIRCRAFT_BOMB_COUNT, this gets the amount of countermeasures that are present on this vehicle.Use _SET_AIRCRAFT_COUNTERMEASURE_COUNT to set the current amount.Old name:  _GET_AIRCRAFT_COUNTERMEASURE_COUNTExamples:LuaC#local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
print("This plane has " .. GetAircraftCountermeasureCount(vehicle) .. " countermeasures left.")
